name: Tetris clone (MisterLemon)
description:
A game made for the Weekly Game Jam 50: Remake a Classic 

It is merely a Tetris clone, do not expect any new feature or a spin-off...

Play using arrow keys:

  • LEFT/RIGHT: Move 
  • UP                      : Rotate
  • DOWN            : Drop 

Score 100 rows to win the game.

Notes: 

I am new to game development and this is the first game jam I participate in. 

My main focus was to finish with something playable while learning new things and having fun on the way. 

Useful reasources I have been using (thanks!):

Unity 2D Tetris Tutorial: https://noobtuts.com/unity/2d-tetris-game/

"Silkscreen" font by  by Jason Kottke

Sounds: 

1. https://sampleswap.org/

2. https://freesound.org/people/jivatma07/sounds/173858/
